mapper.select: call sp_service_center_notice_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call sp_service_center_notice_detail(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
